item.name: PDA
item.description: A state of the art organizer that Riku received for a senior year gift. He can keep memos, write information, and also play a few simple games on it. A must-have for every tech-savvy teenager.

item.name: Antique Knife
item.description: A knife dropped by the two assassins sent after Riku. The blade is an extremely hard steel, and the hilt is inlaid with silver, gold and bronze. It has a strange signet on it that Riku doesn't recognize.

item.name: Empty Wallet
item.description: A wallet given to Riku by his parents when he was 10 years old. It has a picture of PuniUni on it. Riku likes it so much he refuses to use any other wallet, but he doesn't let his friends see it.

item.name: Full Wallet
item.description: A wallet given to Riku by his parents when he was 10 years old. It has a picture of PuniUni on it. Riku likes it so much he refuses to use any other wallet, but he doesn't let his friends see it. It contains a wad of cash.

item.name: Parent's Good Luck Charm
item.description: This is a deep red jewel that Riku was found with as a baby. It seems to have a strange liquid inside, and has a faint glow. Riku's parents kept it hidden from him until now. It isn't made of any material known in science.

item.name: Map to Susa's Estate
item.description: A map of Susa's grounds where Susa's temple is. It's several acres big, in total, so the map is very large. Riku will probably need it so that he doesn't get lost.

item.name: Fire Salve
item.description: A protective salve that helps heal burns and protect from fire abilities.

item.name: First Ice Sculpture
item.description: The first sculpture Roman ever managed to do with his ice abilities. It's a bit ugly and malformed, but Roman loves it and doesn't seem to want to fix it.

item.name: Makai Rose
item.description: A special breed of rose created by Soume. It mixes the DNA of several different roses from the human world, and roses from the demon world. It has no thorns and smells like heaven.

item.name: Strawberry Shortcake
item.description: A cake from Riku's favorite bakery. It has thick, luscious strawberries and perfectly crafted cream.

item.name: Improved Ice Sculpture
item.description: An ice sculpture Roman created well after he had decent control of his ice power. It is shaped like a Makai Rose, curiously enough...

item.name: Tracking Seeds
item.description: These seeds embed themselves under the skin and work like a homing beacon to allow Soume to track anyone for several thousand kilometers.

item.name: Memo to Family
item.description: A note Susa wrote to her little brother. She hasn't sent it, and it's yellowed and aged, as if it were very old.

item.name: Old Picture
item.description: A picture of Susa, Liza, and their son twenty years ago. They look happy.

item.name: Onigoroshi
item.description: A powerful sake that is very easy to get drunk off of, hence its name, Demon Killer.

item.name: Cooking Spice
item.description: A medley of spices made by Roman, crafted from his years of experience as an assistant chef in a kitchen. It smells strong and spicy.

item.name: Fresh Meat
item.description: A variety of fresh, raw meat kept in Susa's kitchen. Roman checked, there isn't any Majin meat there, though a few things look questionable...

item.name: Marriage License
item.description: A marriage license for the Kamiya and Akemiya families. The Kamiya woman's brother is signed on as a witness...

item.name: Layout Schematics
item.description: The blueprint for the Akemiya and Kamiya households. Gotten by Liza's diligence.

item.name: Temple Keys
item.description: Keys for every nook and cranny in the temple.

item.name: Pungent Pollen
item.description: A crushed blend of plants, made specially by Soume. The smell is calming...it makes one want to forget all of his troubles. Soume seems to use this pollen a lot...but all of its effects are not known.

item.name: Transreceiver
item.description: A plant that apparently can work like a little walkie talkie.

item.name: Spare Parts
item.description: Spare parts for Doctor Osamu's machinery.

item.name: Laboratory Equipment
item.description: Laboratory materials that Doctor Osamu is teaching Riku to use.

item.name: Birthday Cake
item.description: A wonderful vegan birthday cake Riku made for Roman's 100th birthday.

item.name: Birthday Decorations
item.description: A wonderful floral arrangement Soume made for Roman's 100th birthday.

item.name: Wrapped Gift
item.description: A pristinely wrapped present for Roman's 100th birthday.

item.name: Hunt Duck Gun
item.description: A gun used with a video game called Hunt Duck, which is Susa's favorite game. She broke her old one over Riku's head, and he must pay for it.

item.name: Io Seed
item.description: Planting Item.

item.name: Church of the Acts Signet
item.description: A signet that represents the Church of the Acts, the major religion across the world, with headquarters stationed in rural Japan. Though it is most popular in America and Europe, it is rapidly picking up speed in Asia.

item.name: Gold Coin
item.description: A coin from the Makai. It's greened from its age, and it looks to have some sort of jewel in the center of the gold.

item.name: Amethyst
item.description: A purple stone.

item.name: Makai Candles
item.description: Candles from Makai with special properties.

item.name: Anti-Majin Seals
item.description: These seals were crafted 2000 years ago as a way to prevent Majin energy from penetrating an area. It severely weakens any Majin who manages to be surrounded by them, and it also prevents things like Tracking Seeds from working. The protective seals the Japanese use today are less effective versions of these ancient seals.

item.name: Garden Vegetables
item.description: Some vegetables collected from Soume's garden. They have a strong smell, which is odd for vegetables...it is possible that they will grow teeth. Better not eat these.

item.name: Herbs
item.description: Herbs that Soume grows in his garden. Like everything Soume grows, it has a very strong, lovely scent. These herbs may be edible, but Soume usually crushes them into powders for pollens.

item.name: Aqua Clara
item.description: A potion that replenishes the mind.

item.name: Aqua Terra
item.description: A potion that replenishes the body.

item.name: Aqua Vita
item.description: A potion that replenishes the soul.

item.name: Mitsumata Flower
item.description: A flower that grows in Japan. It means "unsuspecting love" and is used to make Japanese paper.

item.name: PuniUni
item.description: PuniUni is a favorite icon amongst young children and teenaged girls. He's an adorable sea urchin, and will soon have his own TV show. Riku has a picture of him on his wallet, but he doesn't show it to others in case they make fun of him.

item.name: Dried Majin Bone
item.description: Old dried majin bone.

item.name: Brand New Kimono
item.description: Bought for Soume at the store.

item.name: Intro to Majin Biological Processes
item.description: A medical book written by Doctor Osamu, to help others learn about Majin biology. This is the first book in the series.

item.name: Adv. Majin Biological Processes
item.description: A medical book written by Doctor Osamu to help others learn about Majin biology. This is the second book in the series.

item.name: Majin Organ Systemic Function
item.description: An advanced textbox written by Doctor Osamu to help new Majin doctors learn about Majin biology. It focuses on organs and systemic functions.

item.name: Prophesies and Falsehoods
item.description: A historical textbook written by Doctor Osamu about prophesies amongst the underground Majin world.

item.name: I Can't Believe It's Vegan!
item.description: One of Roman's many vegan cookbooks. The stuff in here actually tastes pretty darn good!

item.name: Book6
item.description: This is book 6's desc.

item.name: Book7
item.description: This is book 7's desc.

item.name: Book8
item.description: This is book 8's desc.

item.name: Gardening Set
item.description: A set of gardening tools put together by Soume. There's some soil, a small shovel, a pot and some seeds.

item.name: Cellular Phone
item.description: A state of the art cellular phone with all the bells and whistles.

item.name: State of the Art Video Game
item.description: The new video game system that recently came out in Japan. Susa doesn't like it at all, and sticks with the old video game system.

item.name: Hyper Strength Potion
item.description: A potion drafted by the owner of the little Majin shop. No clue what's in it, but it seems to invigorate you when you hold it.

item.name: Hyper Elemental Potion
item.description: A potion drafted by the owner of the little Majin shop. No clue what's in it, but it seems to invigorate you when you hold it.

item.description: Planting Item.

item.name: Ao Plant
item.description: A plant grown from the Ao seed. It adds __HP and __MP.

item.name: Monster Ao Plant
item.description: A plant grown from the Ao seed. Mutations caused it to look like this. It adds __HP and __MP.
